notes.voltage_column: Change 'voltage' in column_mapping to the actual column name containing voltage input
notes.velocity_column: Change 'velocity' in column_mapping to match your velocity column name
notes.derived_features: Features to extract from high-frequency current (10 kHz). Available: rms, peak_to_peak, variance, mean, max, min, slope, zero_crossing_rate. If empty, no current features will appear in output.
notes.base_features: Low-frequency variables from communication data (500 Hz). Do NOT include 'current' here - current is high-frequency and must appear only through derived_features.
